solution_line_template: Each employee needs ${employee_desired_salary}-${employee_current_salary}=$<<{employee_desired_salary}-{employee_current_salary}={additional_per_employee}>>{additional_per_employee} more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay ${additional_per_employee}*{num_employees}=$<<{additional_per_employee}*{num_employees}={total_additional_cost}>>{total_additional_cost} extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of ${emily_original_salary}-${total_additional_cost}=$<<{emily_original_salary}-{total_additional_cost}={emily_new_salary}>>{emily_new_salary} per year.
